keyMoments.title: Bacura Released as Executioner
keyMoments.description: Bacura, the massive black panther executioner of Amazon Lily, is released to kill Luffy in the arena. The Kuja warriors believe no one can survive Bacura's attack.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Bacura as Amazon Lily's traditional method of execution and establishes the creature's fearsome reputation.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bacura is defeated by Luffy with a single devastating punch, shocking the entire Kuja tribe who have never seen anyone beat the executioner panther so easily.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's incredible strength and establishes that he is far more powerful than the Kuja initially believed.

relationships.description: Bacura is Sandersonia's pet panther and serves as Amazon Lily's executioner.

reveals.information: Serves as Amazon Lily's executioner for generations

keyMoments.title: Marguerite's Confession
keyMoments.description: Marguerite confesses to bringing Luffy onto Amazon Lily and takes full responsibility, trying to protect Sweet Pea and Aphelandra from punishment.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Marguerite's noble character and willingness to sacrifice herself for her friends.
keyMoments.quote: I brought the man to this island. Please punish only me.

keyMoments.title: Turned to Stone
keyMoments.description: Hancock uses her Mero Mero no Mi powers to turn Marguerite into a stone statue as punishment for helping Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: This is the episode's most tragic moment and serves as the emotional catalyst for Luffy's rage against Hancock.

relationships.description: Marguerite helped Luffy when he arrived on Amazon Lily and befriended him despite the island's laws.

evolutionMoments.description: Marguerite's sacrifice and punishment because of Luffy deepens their bond.

reveals.information: Willing to sacrifice herself to protect her friends

keyMoments.title: Hancock's Secret Seen
keyMoments.description: Luffy sees the mark on Hancock's back, causing her to become furious and determined to kill him to protect her secret.
keyMoments.significance: First hint at the Gorgon Sisters' tragic past as slaves, though the full truth is not revealed until later.
keyMoments.quote: He saw my back. He'll have to die.

keyMoments.title: Pistol Kiss Used on Luffy
keyMoments.description: Hancock attempts to petrify Luffy using her Pistol Kiss technique, but fails because Luffy feels no attraction toward her.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the weakness of the Mero Mero no Mi and showcases Luffy's pure-hearted nature.

keyMoments.title: Petrifies Marguerite and Friends
keyMoments.description: Hancock turns Marguerite, Sweet Pea, and Aphelandra to stone as punishment for helping Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's ruthlessness and the full danger of her Devil Fruit ability.

abilities.description: Hancock blows a kiss that creates a heart-shaped bullet to fire at her target, potentially petrifying them.
Hancock can petrify others by making them feel attraction toward her or by direct contact with her powers.

relationships.description: Sandersonia is Hancock's younger sister. They share a tragic past as slaves.
Marigold is Hancock's younger sister. They share a tragic past as slaves.
Hancock sees Luffy as a threat who must be eliminated because he saw her secret.

reveals.information: Has a mark on her back that must be kept hidden at all costs
Can petrify people with her Mero Mero no Mi powers, even without them feeling attraction

name.japanese: ボア・サンダーソニア

keyMoments.title: Gorgon Sisters Revealed
keyMoments.description: Sandersonia is introduced as one of the Gorgon Sisters, with Elder Nyon explaining their legendary defeat of the Gorgon monster and the curse they received.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Sandersonia and the fabricated legend used to hide the sisters' true past.

keyMoments.title: Hebi Hebi no Mi Transformation
keyMoments.description: Sandersonia transforms using her Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda, becoming a massive snake-human hybrid.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Sandersonia's Devil Fruit powers and sets up the battle against Luffy.

abilities.description: Sandersonia can transform into an anaconda-human hybrid or full anaconda using her Zoan Devil Fruit.

relationships.description: Sandersonia is Hancock's younger sister and loyal supporter.

reveals.information: Ate the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda
Is one of the three Gorgon Sisters

name.japanese: ボア・マリーゴールド

keyMoments.title: Gorgon Sisters Revealed
keyMoments.description: Marigold is introduced as one of the Gorgon Sisters, with Elder Nyon explaining their legendary defeat of the Gorgon monster and the curse they received.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Marigold and the fabricated legend used to hide the sisters' true past.

keyMoments.title: Hebi Hebi no Mi Transformation
keyMoments.description: Marigold transforms using her Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra, becoming a massive snake-human hybrid.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Marigold's Devil Fruit powers and sets up the battle against Luffy.

abilities.description: Marigold can transform into a king cobra-human hybrid or full king cobra using her Zoan Devil Fruit.

relationships.description: Marigold is Hancock's younger sister and loyal supporter.

reveals.information: Ate the Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra
Is one of the three Gorgon Sisters

keyMoments.title: Immune to Mero Mero Powers
keyMoments.description: Luffy is revealed to be immune to Hancock's Mero Mero no Mi petrification because he feels no attraction toward her.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's pure-hearted nature and reveals a key weakness of the Mero Mero no Mi.
keyMoments.quote: That was just like Foxy's Noro Noro Beam!

keyMoments.title: Defeats Bacura with One Punch
keyMoments.description: Enraged by Hancock's cruelty, Luffy defeats the execution panther Bacura with a single devastating punch.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases Luffy's incredible strength and his emotional response when friends are hurt.

relationships.description: Luffy feels responsible for Marguerite's punishment and is desperate to save her.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy takes full responsibility for Marguerite being turned to stone and vows to save her.

reveals.information: Is immune to the Mero Mero no Mi because he feels no lust or attraction

keyMoments.title: Turned to Stone
keyMoments.description: Sweet Pea is turned to stone by Hancock along with Marguerite and Aphelandra as punishment for helping Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's ruthlessness and willingness to punish even innocent bystanders.

relationships.description: Sweet Pea is Marguerite's close friend and companion.

keyMoments.title: Turned to Stone
keyMoments.description: Aphelandra is turned to stone by Hancock along with Marguerite and Sweet Pea as punishment for helping Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Hancock's ruthlessness and willingness to punish even innocent bystanders.

relationships.description: Aphelandra is Marguerite's close friend and companion.

keyMoments.title: Explains the Gorgon Legend
keyMoments.description: Elder Nyon explains to the crowd the fabricated legend of how the Gorgon Sisters defeated a monster and were cursed with eyes on their backs.
keyMoments.significance: Provides the cover story that hides the sisters' true past as slaves of the Celestial Dragons.
keyMoments.quote: Those three defeated the legendary Gorgon and received a curse for it.

relationships.description: Gloriosa serves as advisor to Empress Hancock.
